typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		SAL as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		PKEY as integer,
		NAME as string,
		ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SOURCE
source1, SOURCE lookup(source1@ID == SOURCE@ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink() ~> sink1
